invoke

public static void invoke(boolean wait,
                          Runnable runnable)
Runs the specified action in an SWT compatible thread, which is:
  • Mac OSX
    • Main Thread: Run on OSX UI main thread.
  • Linux, Windows, ..
    • Current thread.

See Also:
Platform.AWT_AVAILABLE, Platform.getOSType()
